feed.title: Combined summary - Receiving node on mainnet?

entry.title: Combined summary - Receiving node on mainnet?
entry.summary: If you are looking to test with people who have mainnet Lightning Network nodes, the Lightning Network subreddit may be a good place to start. There is plenty of discussion on the subreddit from those with mainnet Lightning Network nodes. Alternatively, the #mainnet channel on the LN Discord is also recommended. Ad치n S치nchez de Pedro Crespo, CTO of Stampery Inc., offered to open a channel and play "the invoice game" back and forth if provided with node_id and IP address information.
